item.title: Use ChatGPT in your Terminal (Bash, PowerShell, Python): An Introduction to the ChatGPT CLI Tool for Developers
item.dc:creator: SimeonOnSecurity
item.category: "ChatGPT" , "OpenAI" , "Command Line Interface" , "CLI" , "text generation" , "question answering" , "developer toolkit" , "pip package manager" , "Python 3.5" , "PowerShell" , "Bash"
item.description: Learn how to use the OpenAI's ChatGPT model through the convenient Command Line Interface (CLI) for text generation and question answering with ease.
